title: Apple Inc. stock falls Tuesday, underperforms market
text:
Shares of Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        -0.47%
       slipped 1.23% to $183.63 Tuesday, on what proved to be an all-around dismal trading session for the stock market, with the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        +0.49%
       falling 0.19% to 14,944.35 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 0.62% to 37,361.12. Apple Inc. closed $15.99 below its 52-week high ($199.62), which the company reached on December 14th. The stock underperformed when compared to some of its competitors Tuesday, as Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        +0.34%
       rose 0.46% to $390.27, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +0.24%
       fell 0.11% to $144.08, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.27%
       fell 0.11% to $142.49. Trading volume (65.4 M) eclipsed its 50-day average volume of 53.5 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. Slowing demand for electric vehicles is to blame.
